subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Goran Dragic scored 23 of his 26 points in the fourth quarter, and the visiting Suns stunned the Spurs to take a 3-0 series lead in the Western Conference semifinals.
snippet: Goran Dragic scored 23 of his 26 points in the fourth quarter, and the visiting Suns stunned the Spurs to take a 3-0 series lead in the Western Conference semifinals.
